Package fr.guedesite.utils.mca

Class MCAUtil

java.lang.Object
fr.guedesite.utils.mca.MCAUtil
public final class MCAUtil extends Object
Provides main and utility functions to read and write .mca files and to convert block, chunk and region coordinates.

    • write

      public static int write​(MCAFile mcaFile, String file, boolean changeLastUpdate) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      file - The file to write to.
      mcaFile - The data of the MCA file to write.
      changeLastUpdate - Whether to adjust the timestamps of when the file was saved.
      Returns:
      The amount of chunks written to the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If something goes wrong during serialization.
      See Also:
      write(MCAFile, File, boolean)

    • write

      public static int write​(MCAFile mcaFile, File file, boolean changeLastUpdate) throws IOException
      Writes an MCAFile object to disk. It optionally adjusts the timestamps when the file was last saved to the current date and time or leaves them at the value set by either loading an already existing MCA file or setting them manually.
      If the file already exists, it is completely overwritten by the new file (no modification).
      Parameters:
      file - The file to write to.
      mcaFile - The data of the MCA file to write.
      changeLastUpdate - Whether to adjust the timestamps of when the file was saved.
      Returns:
      The amount of chunks written to the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If something goes wrong during serialization.

    • createNameFromChunkLocation

      public static String createNameFromChunkLocation​(int chunkX, int chunkZ)
      Turns the chunks coordinates into region coordinates and calls createNameFromRegionLocation(int, int)
      Parameters:
      chunkX - The x-value of the location of the chunk.
      chunkZ - The z-value of the location of the chunk.
      Returns:
      A mca filename in the format "r.{regionX}.{regionZ}.mca"

    • createNameFromBlockLocation

      public static String createNameFromBlockLocation​(int blockX, int blockZ)
      Turns the block coordinates into region coordinates and calls createNameFromRegionLocation(int, int)
      Parameters:
      blockX - The x-value of the location of the block.
      blockZ - The z-value of the location of the block.
      Returns:
      A mca filename in the format "r.{regionX}.{regionZ}.mca"

    • createNameFromRegionLocation

      public static String createNameFromRegionLocation​(int regionX, int regionZ)
      Creates a filename string from provided chunk coordinates.
      Parameters:
      regionX - The x-value of the location of the region.
      regionZ - The z-value of the location of the region.
      Returns:
      A mca filename in the format "r.{regionX}.{regionZ}.mca"
